name: oci_new_cursor
purpose: Allocates and returns a new cursor (statement handle)

return.description: Returns a new statement handle, or FALSE on error.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ocinewcursor instead.
    This name still can be used, it was left as alias of
    oci_new_cursor for downwards compatability.
    This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
